title: LoL Won't Launch (please fix)
body: Every time i try to open league, it says that "LoLLauncher" is open but when i click on it all i see is a white dot (barely visible on the homescreen, only a few pixels or so). please fix this or give me suggestions as to how i can fix it.

replies.body: This is most commonly a systems permissions thing.   Basically, the patcher is trying to launch itself, but the operating system isn't allowing it to do so.  I'd check out our [Setting up your Permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104) article which should help with this :D  Let me know if it works for you!
